com.gwt.ss
Class GwtUsernamePasswordAuthority

java.lang.Object
  com.gwt.ss.GwtUsernamePasswordAuthority
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, InitializingBean, ApplicationContextAware, ApplicationListener<InteractiveAuthenticationSuccessEvent>, ServletContextAware
public class GwtUsernamePasswordAuthority
extends Object
implements ServletContextAware, InitializingBean, ApplicationContextAware, ApplicationListener<InteractiveAuthenticationSuccessEvent>

Monitor <form-login> event.
When <form-login> come from GWT RPC, return void message when success and prone GwtBadCredentialsException when failed. Not effect with web page form-login.
Note: Certification extracting code provide by Amit Khanna
監控<form-login>登錄處理
若使用GWT RPC進行登錄，本類別實例負責回應GWT RPC，否則交由Spring Security本身處理
註:取出帳號資料之程式由Amit Khanna提供
